# [FEAT] Help Center Search

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement powerful search functionality for the help center to help customers find answers quickly.

## Requirements

### Search Engine
- Full-text search
- Fuzzy matching
- Synonym support
- Stemming (word variations)
- Relevance ranking
- Instant search (as-you-type)

### Search Features
- Search suggestions/autocomplete
- Search filters (category, date, etc.)
- Highlighted search terms in results
- "Did you mean" suggestions
- Zero results recommendations

### Search Scope
- Article titles and bodies
- Tags and labels
- Community posts (if enabled)
- Attachments/files
- Custom fields

### Search Optimization
- Search analytics
- Popular searches display
- Search result boosting
- Promoted/featured results
- AI-powered recommendations

### Search Reporting
- Search terms analytics
- Failed searches tracking
- Search-to-ticket correlation
- Search refinement patterns
- Content gap identification

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk uses labels to improve search relevance, and bots use labels to influence search results.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Full-text search works
- [ ] Autocomplete functional
- [ ] Filters available
- [ ] Analytics tracked
- [ ] AI recommendations work
